snippet: If there was one positive for the Mets to take from their marathon 20-inning loss to the Marlins Saturday it was that Matt Harvey did not turn out to be seriously hurt.
abstract: If there was one positive for the Mets to take from their marathon 20-inning loss to the Marlins Saturday it was that Matt Harvey did not turn out to be seriously hurt.

headline.main: Harvey Feeling Fine After Exiting Game With Back Tightness
